property.name: type
property.description: The type of item. For a disclosure button item the value must be "disclosure-button".

property.name: disclosure
property.description: Settings to show the disclosure. This is the same settings object that gets passed into *[link:A5.ControlBar.showDisclosure]*.

property.name: settings
property.description: The settings for the disclosure button.

property.name: show
property.description: The settings for the show disclosure button. This will be rendered when the disclosure is not yet shown.

property.name: theme
property.description: The theme to use for the button.

property.name: layout
property.description: The layout of the button. Values are "text", "icon", "text icon", "icon text", "text/icon", "icon/text", "text-icon" and "icon-text".

property.name: style
property.description: The inline CSS to put on the button.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the button.

property.name: hoverClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the button when the user hovers over it.

property.name: pressedClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the button when the user presses it.

property.name: disabledClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the button when it is disabled.

property.name: iconStyle
property.description: The inline CSS to put on the icon in the button.

property.name: iconClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the icon in the button.

property.name: html
property.description: The HTML to use in the button. Can contain template syntax that references control bar data. If there is a value in the data named "customer", it can be accessed by putting "{customer}" into the HTML.

property.name: icon
property.description: The icon to use in the button.

property.name: hoverIcon
property.description: The icon to use in the button when the user hovers over it.

property.name: pressedIcon
property.description: The icon to use in the button when the user presses it.

property.name: disabledIcon
property.description: The icon to use in the button when it is disabled.
